title: University of Wisconsin Doctor and Husband Found Dead in a Ditch
description: The bodies of a University of Wisconsin doctor and her husband were found in a ditch at a Madison research and recreation area this week. Police are investigating their deaths as a double homicide and “targeted act of violence.”Dr. Beth Potter, 52, and Robin …
